title: PBE -How long will take to accept me after i applied ??
body: How long will take to accept me after i applied ??

replies.body:
PBE invites are done at random, and they may invite players who fit certain criteria when they are looking to test new content (like Taric mains for a Taric update). Having punishments on your account will reduce your chances of being accepted.

They typically invite more people as needed every 2 weeks for each new PBE cycle, so you could get lucky and be accepted at the next cycle or you could never get in.

Admission into PBE can vary depending on a few factors such as what's being tested.  We have a [PBE FAQ ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pbe-faq)available that provides more specifics and tips on getting into the PBE.  Please let us know if you have any questions!
